extension.summary: Integrate Kodi with popular digital assistants
extension.description: Connects to Media Steward's remote server (mediasteward.io), which forwards commands from Google Home or Alexa right to your Kodi. This link passes commands to and from the same JSON RPC API usually exposed by the web service.
extension.disclaimer: You must acquire an activation code from mediasteward.io.
